title: The Lions Got Shut Out?!
description:
The guys tackle the biggest games, and biggest developments of the week - from Lamar's late-game heroics, to a stunning Giants upset over the Packers, to Matt Rhule licking his lips alot and getting fired. But the big story of the week is, of course, Jalen's Lions. They were shut out by the Patriots 29-0, and lost to Bailey Zappe, Western Kentucky Hilltopper LEGEND! How? Why? To get Jalen's reaction, apology, and more - tap in with the team. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
